mema awasthawata sithulpawwa rajamaha wiharadhipathi pujya matarambaa hemarathana nayaka himi, thissamaharama rajamaha wiharadhipathi pujya aacharya dewalegama dhammasena nayaka himi, mulkirigala rajamaha wiharadhipathi pujya beligalle saranapala nayaka himi, mathara palatuwa bauddhodhaya wiharadhipathi gatamanne gunananda himi, sudarshana dharma nikethanaye lelwala samitha himi athulu bhikshun wahanse, warimarga amathya chamal rajapaksha, agramathya lekam gamini senarath, dakunu palath aandukara wili gamage, buddhashasana, sanskruthika ha aagamika katayuthu amathyansha lekam em. ke. bandula harischandra, bauddha katuyathu komasaris jenaral sunanda kariyapperuma athulu amathyansha lekamwaru saha dakunu palath rajya niladharin rasak mema awasthawata sahabhagi wuha.

werala khadanaya - wikipidiya adhika sagara khadanaya: engalanthaye nagenahira hanstantan hi kandu bawuma sagara jalaye kriyakarithwaya hewath sagara jalaya aashritha nirmanaya wana sagara tharanga,wadadiya,badiya,ha diyawalwala balapamen werala khadanaya siduwe.mehidi prabala wanne sagara tharangayi.sagara jala thalaya mathu pitin sulanga gatima nisa sagara tharanga hewath rala nirmanaya we.mema rala wegayen werale wadima nisa werala khadanaya ugra weyi.sruthumaya sulan,wasuli ha bhumi kamipawaladi hataganna sunami tharangada khadanaya wegawath karayi.
